modules.description: This is a resource pack made by me , Shreyanshnarwe1 , and you do NOT have the permission to use it , rather do read and learn the code inputted in the folders , recreate the folder structure , make a new manifest.json , customize it as of https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/minecraft/creator/documents/resourcepack , fill two new uuids and then finally write the code you just learnt in debug_screen.json . Thank You
